channel.title: Power BI on Sebastian Lubene
channel.description: Recent content in Power BI on Sebastian Lubene

item.title: Dashboard - Adventure Work
item.description: This project is about designing and delivering a professional-quality, end-to-end business intelligence solution using Microsoft Power BI. I’ll be working through the entire business intelligence workflow: Connecting and shaping the source data Building a relational model Adding calculated columns and measures Designing an interactive report

item.title: Dashboard - Maven Market
item.description: This project is about designing and delivering a professional-quality, end-to-end business intelligence solution using Microsoft Power BI. I’ll be working through the entire business intelligence workflow: Connecting and shaping the source data Building a relational model Adding calculated columns and measures Designing an interactive report If you want to access a certain Product Name by a specific Product Brand in Product dashboard, in Topline Performance dashboard right click on the Product Brand, select Drill through and Product.
